<center>

<h1> Cayuga Lake Watershed Intermunicipal Organization </h1>
<br>
<div class="jumbotron">
  <p class="lead">The municipalities within the Cayuga Lake watershed recognize the <br> enormous and
  irreplaceable ecological, economic and social value of <br> Cayuga Lake, its tributaries, and its wetlands. 
  <br><br>
  The **purpose** of the Intermunicipal Organization is to bring the watershed municipalities together to
  work collectively and collaboratively on monitoring, protecting, and restoring the health of the
  watershed.</p>
</div>

</center>

<div class="panel panel-primary">
<div class="panel-heading">IO Membership</div>
<div class="panel-body"><h5>The Intermunicipal Organization consists of appointed representatives from the municipalities within the Cayuga Lake watershed.</h5>
